explanation: [0-0] On a snow-covered road, inside a car, a white crosswalk is visible ahead. In the distance are leafless trees. One pedestrian, wearing gray, stands on the left side of the crosswalk, while another, wearing pink, stands on the right. Russian subtitles appear at the bottom of the screen.

[0-2] Next, the two people on either side of the crosswalk start to cross. The person in gray walks to the right, and the person in pink walks to the left. An orange label with text appears and shakes at the top of the screen.

[0-2] Next, the two people on either side of the crosswalk start to cross. The person in gray walks to the right, and the person in pink walks to the left. An orange label with text appears and shakes at the top of the screen.

[2-5] Immediately, the person in pink runs swiftly to the left, grabs the person in gray, and quickly runs to the left side of the crosswalk as a black car speeds past. The subtitles "МOSTBET", "BONUS", and "SHORTS" appear at the top of the screen.
